lead_paragraph: Shares of Pfizer, one of the largest drug companies in the world, traded lower after the company said it would not split up into two smaller companies.

headline.print_headline: Another Down Day on Wall Street
headline.main: Wall St. Closes Lower, Weighed Down by Banks and Health Care

snippet: Shares of Pfizer, one of the largest drug companies in the world, traded lower after the company said it would not split up into two smaller companies....
abstract: Stocks fall for second day in row, with banks reporting biggest losses.
